programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brennan and Angela get caught in a dance club, Brennan kicks someone into a wall causing it to break open revealing a mummified corpse and a stash of methamphetamines.Guests: Morris Chestnut..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Howard Epps is scheduled to be executed by lethal injection unless his attorney can make a last minute appeal to Booth and Brennan to re-examine the case.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Halliwell matriarchs gather to bless baby Wyatt; Paige casts a truth spell to see if her boyfriend can handle her secret life.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo turns the sisters into Greek goddesses so they will be able to vanquish mythic giants; Piper's life is turned upside down when Leo accepts the call to become leader of the Elders.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo turns the sisters into Greek goddesses so they will be able to vanquish mythic giants; Piper's life is turned upside down when Leo accepts the call to become leader of the Elders.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters learn Leo is being held captive on the Island of Valhalla and must disguise themselves as Valkyries to rescue him.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean make a trip to Hollywood to investigate the death of one of the actors on a horror film set. They discover the death was a publicity hoax. Sam and Dean realize they are dealing with a haunted set.Guests: Gary Cole..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A ghost has been killing off inmates one by one at a stage penitentiary. Sam and Dean decide the best way to investigate this spirit is from the inside and allow themselves to get thrown into the jail. However, getting out becomes a challenge.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: What Is and What Should Never Be
programme.desc: While hunting a Djinn, a genie, Dean is attacked and transported to a world where his mother is alive. Sam is in law school and is engaged to Jessica. Dean must decide whether he wants to stay in this new life or return to the hunt.Guests: Samantha Smith, Michelle Borth..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam is abducted by the Yellow-Eyed Demon and finds himself in a ghost town with other children who have special abilities. Dean enlists Bobby to help find Sam.Guests: Jim Beaver..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean must deal with the aftermath of the fight between Sam and Jake and pays steep price for his involvement.Guests: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Aldis Hodge..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and the team go to work on a girl who is found in a refrigerator. Booth discovers an old ransom note sent to the girl's parents shortly after she disappeared.Guests: Josh Hopkins..

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Man in the Fallout Shelter
programme.desc: Construction workers find a skeleton in an old fallout shelter from the 1950s and the Jeffersonian is brought in to help identify the remains. When Zack cuts into the bone, he accidentally releases spores of the deadly fungus Valley Fever.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth travel to Los Angeles to determine the identity of a woman whose body parts were found near Los Angeles International Airport.Guests: Penny Marshall..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a woman's burned body is found in her car with signs that her child was kidnapped, Brennan and Booth suspect the father, Carl Decker. Decker is set to testify against his bosses and suspects that they may have something to do with the crime.

programme.title: The Mule
programme.desc: An old man who's broke and estranged from his family becomes a drug mule for a Mexican cartel in an attempt to make ends meet, but when his past mistakes start to weigh on his heart he tries to make things right before the DEA catches up with him.

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: A soldier awakes to find himself in a different body and is tasked with finding the bomber of a commuter train.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The murder of a petty officer leads Pride and his team to a mysterious woman who is targeting men with high security clearance. Also, Lasalle's father, Beau, arrives in town to discuss the family business.Guests: Michael Angelo Pniewski..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After taking a job walking dogs Paige is amazed to find one has turned into a man.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Cleaners take Wyatt and erase all memory of him; Phoebe's lack of control over her new empathic power makes her start a barroom brawl.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Three evil sisters steal the Charmed Ones' identities and powers; Paige realizes magic will always be a part of her life; Leo tries to find out who put him on the Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When the sisters hold a séance, they contact a vengeful ghost who has been fomenting trouble between families.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean head off to Nebraska to capture seven demons that are the manifestations of the Seven Deadly Sins.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: In Indiana to visit an old girlfriend, Dean meets her 8-year-old son Ben who resembles him. When Ben and other kids go missing, the brothers discover that the kidnapper is a demon that takes their form.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean get a call that someone has broken into their dad's secret storage. A cursed rabbit's foot was taken giving that person extreme good luck until it's lost or stolen.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: In a small Ohio town, demons are persuading the townsfolk's to succumb to their basic instinct. Ruby shares some stunning news with Bobby while they try to rebuild the Colt from scratch.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam travel to a small town where the murders resemble fairy tales. Later Sam threatens the Crossroad Demon with the newly rebuilt Colt.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Seeley Booth and Temperance Brennan are called in when a decomposed body is found in a local alley and the cause of death is unknown. Their investigation reveals the body is that of a teenage boy whose only friends were his beloved comic books.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: An El Salvadoran gang member is stopped with the dug-up corpse of a young woman in the trunk of his car. Booth and Brennan find out that the woman was buried at a soon-to-be excavated community garden, and they soon find that a second body is missing.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Zack are called to the crash site of a small jet carrying Chinese diplomats and one mystery female passenger. Brennan discovers three small bone fragments that didn't come from the plane and might be linked to a missing local man.
